How to Play

  1. The Human player places 5 ships: carrier (5 units long), battleship (4 units long), cruiser (3 units long), submarine (3 units long), and destroyer (2 units long). The ship orientation can be horizontal or vertical. The computer difficulty can be chosen (easy or hard).
  2. The computer player places their 5 ships.
  3. Once ships are placed, the game begins and the human player can place an attack on the computer player's board.
  4. An attack can result in a hit or a miss. Once all sections of a ship have been hit, the ship will sink.
  5. After the human player has attacked, then the computer player will attack.
  6. Whichever player sinks all of the opponent's ships first wins.
